mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_inventorybasedetail (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ITID, QUANTITY, REALQUANTITY, STORAGEID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_wms_inventorybasedetail set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITID = #{itid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALQUANTITY = #{realquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGEID = #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ITID, QUANTITY, REALQUANTITY, STORAGEID from t_wms_inventorybasedetail where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ITID, QUANTITY, REALQUANTITY, STORAGEID from t_wms_inventorybasedetail
